qa.question: how can i register on meditracklite
qa.answer: Click on 'Login' from the homepage and select whether you're a patient or doctor...

qa.question: how do i login
qa.answer: Go to the homepage and click on 'Login'. Enter your registered email and password to access your dashboard.

qa.question: how do i logout
qa.answer: Click on your profile icon and select 'Logout' from the dropdown menu.

qa.question: how can i book an appointment
qa.answer: To book an appointment, go to the 'Doctors' page, select a doctor, and click 'Book Appointment'.

qa.question: how do i view my appointments
qa.answer: Go to your Dashboard and click on 'Appointments' to see your scheduled bookings.

qa.question: how can i cancel my appointment
qa.answer: Navigate to your 'Appointments' section and click on the 'Cancel' button next to the appointment.

qa.question: what is a pending appointment
qa.answer: A pending appointment means the doctor has not yet approved or confirmed your booking.

qa.question: how can i find a doctor
qa.answer: Visit the 'Doctors' section where all approved doctors are listed with their profiles and specializations.

qa.question: how do i contact my doctor
qa.answer: Once your appointment is booked, contact details or instructions may be shared in the 'Appointment Details' section.

qa.question: what does approved doctor mean
qa.answer: An approved doctor is one who has been verified by the admin and is available for booking.

qa.question: how do i update my profile
qa.answer: Log in to your dashboard, click on 'Profile', make your changes, and hit 'Save'.

qa.question: how do i report a technical issue
qa.answer: Please use the 'Support' or 'Help' option on the website to report any bugs or issues you’re facing.

qa.question: how can i report a technical issue
qa.answer: Please use the 'Support' or 'Help' option on the website to report any bugs or issues you’re facing.

qa.question: is my data safe on meditracklite
qa.answer: Yes, MediTrackLite ensures secure handling of your medical and personal data using encryption and access controls.

qa.question: can i use meditracklite on my mobile
qa.answer: Yes, MediTrackLite is mobile-friendly and works on any modern browser.

qa.question: how to reset my password
qa.answer: Use the 'Forgot Password' option on the login page and follow the instructions.

qa.question: what is meditracklite
qa.answer: MediTrackLite is a smart hospital management platform that helps patients connect with doctors, manage appointments, and access healthcare easily.

qa.question: what should i do if i forget my email
qa.answer: If you've forgotten your registered email, please contact support or your hospital admin for help.

qa.question: what if i enter the wrong password
qa.answer: If you enter the wrong password, an error message will appear. You can try again or use 'Forgot Password' to reset it.

qa.question: can i log in with my phone number
qa.answer: Currently, login is only available using your registered email and password.

qa.question: how do i know my registration is successful
qa.answer: You will receive a confirmation notification. Once verified, you can log in and access your dashboard.
